Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: xhappyx
Reviews.Content: This kit is really great. You won't regreat spending your money. The only thing I don't like is a backpack because of only one strap which go across your chest and I realy don't fell comfortable with it. Three great lences. I like the best 18-135mm. Two extra batteries is a huge plus.

Reviews.Title: upgraded from the T1i and love the new features
Reviews.Author: C. M. Fogle
Reviews.Content: I have been using a T1i which I still have and am now using as a backup camera.  I chose the Canon 60D for a number of reasons including the flip screen on back.  I am still on the learning curve however have been able to get some amazingly beautiful and clear photographs.  It is user friendly for a serious hobbyist like me.  It has capabilities that could extend to semi professional, professional photography.

Reviews.Title: 60 d camera
Reviews.Author: terri-lynn
Reviews.Content: I absolutely LOVE LOVE LOVE this camera! I am hoping to make photography a part time career and I am in love with this camera! I love the lenses it came with and the other accessories. The only thing is the back pack is ok. One side of the zipper already broke so I have to use the other zipper to zip the whole bag and it fits my stuff but not that neatly. I need a bigger bag, so I ordered another bag that can fit everything, its a great starter bag in my opinion, but I think a little bit of a bigger bag would be worth it in the future to put in this bundle.

Reviews.Title: Canon 60D
Reviews.Author: Fred J. Blount
Reviews.Content: This product is great if you have some photography experience. If you have no experience, it is still a great product. You can take online training for free.

Reviews.Title: Bundle for the better?
Reviews.Author: mighty_useful
Reviews.Content: First: I'm reviewing the bundle not the camera itself.I paid USD1220 and these kits are all about saving some bucks.The seller lacks information about each part, so it goes what I've got and price I've seen on the web:CLEANING KIT |($-) Vivitar Lens & Screen Cleaning Kit, a cleaning liquid and a clothFILTER |($4) 01 filter Zeikos Digital Multi Coated UV Protector of 58 mm. It fits the 75-300 mm lens.FILTER |($4) 01 filter Zeikos Digital Multi Coated UV Protector of 52 mm. It fits the 50 mm lensLENS HOOD |($4) Vivitar Pro Wide Angle Digital, Lens Hood of 67 mm. It fits the 18-135 mm lensCARD READER |($5) Vivitar Ultra Slim SDHC /Micro SD CA with USB 2.0EXTRA CHARGER |($8) Vivitar Rapid Travel Charger - 1 hour quick charge, 100 to 240V, Europe adapter and car plug.TRIPOD |($10) Zeikos Pro Series. Folded 16"and extends to 50", weights 1.06 lbs. It's too big for the bag, but way smaller than I expected.SD CARD |($12) Transcend Class 10 SDHC 16 gbFILTERS |($13) Vivitar Kit Multi-Coated Series 1 with 03 filters of 67 mm - UV (UV Protective Filter), CPL (Circular Polarizer Filter) and FLD (Florescent Filter). Plus: Wallet to carry them. They fit the 18-135 mm lens. Nice!EXTRA BATTERIES |($22) Vivitar with 02 batteries compatible with Canon LP-E6 (2000 mAh). No protection with it so parts get exposed.BAG |($22) Zeikos ZE-BP2-S Deluxe Backpack with one strap, very akward.LENS |($90) Canon EF 50 mm f1.8 IILENS |($190) Canon EF 75-300 mm f/4 - 5.6 IIILENS |($300**)Canon EF 18-135 mm f/3.5 - 5.6. **if you buy with the bodyBODY |($600***) - Canon EOS 60D ***It was $700 when I ordered, it dropped down $100 now.Therefore, I would pay $1284, so I saved about $64 (if I use the whole kit).Extra saving: I paid no delivery fees - if it was separate purchases might have some expenses then.This was important to me: not only saved some money also saved some time getting all at once.

Reviews.Title: Lovin' it
Reviews.Author: John Pratt "John PrattJohn"
Reviews.Content: Incredible camera. My first Digital SLR. I'm amazed at what it can do. I work in Yosemite natl. park.... I plan on shooting a lot of post cards.

Reviews.Title: wrong charger
Reviews.Author: Jeffrey Benefield
Reviews.Content: I was sent the wrong travel charge for the camera batteries that where sent to me in the kit. It takes E-6 the charge was for E-8. The company was great on correcting this issue. Camera is great deal.

Reviews.Title: Excellent Package Deal!
Reviews.Author: Brittany Neeley
Reviews.Content: I use this all the time. This is my new baby! I've only ever used a point and shoot, but now my DSLR is exactly what I needed to move my photography into the direction I want it to go. One of the best parts about this package is the lens selection. Each lens carries a quality use to it. I use all the lenses all the time, so your money is well spent, vs. getting a lens you will never use and never sell.

Reviews.Title: Great product, bad packaging
Reviews.Author: Chester Finney
Reviews.Content: First off, it took over a week to get to me when it says 3-5 days shipping. Second, the shipping box looked as if it went through a war, resulting in the product boxes getting bent to hell. Third, the carrying bag that I got is not what is shown in the picture.I am very disappointed in how they treated the shipping of this package. It's a great product and I got everything I should have, but the safety of the product was subpar and the time it took to get here is subpar.I would recommend against purchasing from this company.

Reviews.Title: Best deal anywhere
Reviews.Author: HamHam
Reviews.Content: What a great value for everything you get in this set! Perfect mid level camera with three lens for any situations. I took over a thousand pictures at kids sporting events, the camera captures precious moments so beautifully.

Reviews.Title: good package
Reviews.Author: Marvin L. Thomason
Reviews.Content: The best parts were the 3 lenses, the two extra batteriesand the carrying case.  Knew it was a great camera.Marv in Colorado

Reviews.Title: Excellent value for money
Reviews.Author: Fabian
Reviews.Content: Very good kit. Lens combination covers good range. Very good features on camera. Produces great stills as well as video.  Highly recommended.

Reviews.Title: Love the bundle idea.
Reviews.Author: Bradi Stampe
Reviews.Content: I bought this bundle because it came with the camera and three different lenses. Which was perfect. I was however disappointed because the backpack shown is not the backpack I received. When I first noticed, it wasn't a deal breaker, but when I tried to put the bag to use, it was much too small. But the camera and lenses are perfect. This bundle also comes with a tulip hood attachment, it doesn't show that in the picture, so I almost ordered one separate. Glad I didn't.

Reviews.Title: Excellent value
Reviews.Author: John Palmer
Reviews.Content: This is an amazing camera and I have used every item in this ProPack-no wasted or components included just to "pad" the offer.  Good value.

Reviews.Title: Great Value!
Reviews.Author: Candace Munoa
Reviews.Content: This is the best price I found for all of this equipment. Very fast service! I highly recommend this package.

Reviews.Title: Sweet camera bundle..
Reviews.Author: Pab Garcia "Knaya"
Reviews.Content: Perfect bundle the lenses work just perfect the filters are OK tho, SD card is also working properly so far the 2 batteries are just an awesome plus to the bundle, highly recomended altho i think this could be sold for a little less money...

Reviews.Title: nice camera
Reviews.Author: j.hart
Reviews.Content: At first I was hesitant to get this camera, I was deciding to choose the Nikon but after I got the product I saw its capabilities.

ProductInfo.Name: Canon EOS 60D DSLR Camera with 3 Canon Lens Pro Pack: Includes - Canon EF-S 18-135mm f/3.5-5.6 IS Lens - Canon Zoom Telephoto EF 75-300mm III - Canon EF 50mm f1.8 II Autofocus Lens, Also Includes Deleuxe Backpack, 2 Extra Batteries & Travel Charger, 16GB SDHC Card & Card Reader, 3 Piece Pro Filter Kit with 2 Extra UV Filters and much more...
